summary: A savegame character with the likeness of Heather Mason.
descriptionHtml:
ATTENTION: If anyone can find a mod that has better hair than the one I currently used for this, please write a message to me or something; I\'ll update the mod.

Helloes guies and gurls, my first \"mod\".
A savegame with a character that I pathetically tried to make resemble Heather Mason from the Silent Hill 3 game. As of upload, there are to my knowledge no other saves like this.
Constructive critisism appreciated! Tbh I\'m not myself entirely satisfied with the result, but I can\'t seem to get it perfectly. Oh well. Anybody know any other mods that could yield better results?

Required mods to achieve screenshot results:
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10168
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/690
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/12951

You need to use the DeleteEyesTiltPatcher from the enhanced character edit mod.

Also, if anyone can do this better than me, please do so \'cause tbh, it would be really cool to play a proper Heather Mason in Skyrim.

UPDATE: And now it\'s there lol
author: WutPiranha
